Name: OrbRider
About the game: OrbRider makes indoor cycling fun! Ride with your physical cycling machine, an ANT+ USB hardware dongle and an ANT+ enabled speed sensor or smart trainer. You will ride and explore up to 7 different tracks and biomes as you take on multiple challenges, gather resources, and unlock new and undiscovered areas. OrbRider puts you in control your fitness environment, with the ability to control the weather, day and night cycles and the intensity of your workouts, all with the goal of making it fun! â€‹ ADDITIONAL EQUIPMENT REQUIRED OrbRider is only compatible with ANT+ enabled devices including, smart trainers, heart rate monitors, speed and cadence sensors. Warning. This game contains flashing lights, images, and other luminous stimulations which may induce epileptic seizures in certain individuals. This can be most intense during storms with random lightning flash. If you or anyone in your household has an epileptic condition, please consult your doctor before playing any Game. If you experience dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awareness, disorientation, any involuntary movement, or convulsions while playing, please immediately discontinue playing the Game and consult your doctor.
